instance_count.description: The number of worker nodes in your cluster. (Minimum: 3, Maximum 50)

instance_type.description: The type of instance used for the provisioned workers.

resource_group.description: An existing Azure Resource Group where resources will be created.

location.description: The Azure region where the Resource Group is placed.

ssh_username.description: SSH username for accessing the cluster.

ssh_public_key.description: SSH public key for access to worker nodes.

k8s_version.description: Kubernetes version to apply to AKS; must be supported in the selected region. (Run `az aks get-versions --location $REGION --output table` for a list of supported options)

disk_size_gb.description: The worker node storage capacity. (Minimum:80, Maximum: 4095)

cluster_labels.description: Tags to be applied to resources in your cluster. (Optional)

dns_zone_name.description: Name of the Azure DNS Zone created for the cluster.

dns_prefix.description: Prefix for node DNS hostnames. (Must be alphanumeric, may include but not end with dashes)

email.description: Email address to send TLS certificate notifications to.
